query: CREATE TABLE reloptions_test(i INT) WITH (FiLLFaCToR=30, autovacuum_enabled = false, autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor = 0.2)
expected: CREATE TABLE reloptions_test (i INT) WITH (fillfactor = 30, autovacuum_enabled = 'false', autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor = 0.2)

query: SELECT reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid = 'reloptions_test'::regclass
expected: SELECT reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid = CAST('reloptions_test' AS regclass)

query: CREATE TABLE reloptions_test2(i INT) WITH (fillfactor=30, fillfactor=40)
expected: CREATE TABLE reloptions_test2 (i INT) WITH (fillfactor = 30, fillfactor = 40)

query: SELECT reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid = 'reloptions_test'::regclass AND reloptions IS NULL
expected: SELECT reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid = CAST('reloptions_test' AS regclass) AND reloptions IS NULL

query: UPDATE pg_class SET reloptions = '{fillfactor=13,autovacuum_enabled=false,illegal_option=4}' WHERE oid = 'reloptions_test'::regclass
expected: UPDATE pg_class SET reloptions = '{fillfactor=13,autovacuum_enabled=false,illegal_option=4}' WHERE oid = CAST('reloptions_test' AS regclass)

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE reloptions_test(i INT NOT NULL, j text) WITH (vacuum_truncate=false, toast.vacuum_truncate=false, autovacuum_enabled=false)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE reloptions_test (i INT NOT NULL, j TEXT) WITH (vacuum_truncate = 'false', vacuum_truncate = 'false', autovacuum_enabled = 'false')
